actions.text: Read twice and referred to the Committee on Agriculture.
Referred to Subcommittee on Agricultural Production.

committees.subcommittee: Subcommittee on Agricultural Production and Stabilization of Prices

official_title: A bill to amend the Federal Crop Insurance Act to revitalize the Federal crop insurance program, and for other purposes.
short_title: Federal Crop Insurance Revitalization Act of 1989

summary.text: Federal Crop Insurance Revitalization Act of 1989 - Amends the Federal Crop Insurance Act to adjust the methods of calculating price elections and yields for purposes of Federal crop insurance assistance. Provides for: (1) training and certification of crop insurance agents and brokers; and (2) crop insurance information availability through local Agricultural Stabilization and Conservation Service offices.

titles.title: Federal Crop Insurance Revitalization Act of 1989
A bill to amend the Federal Crop Insurance Act to revitalize the Federal crop insurance program, and for other purposes.
